title: Federal Reserve Holds Policy Steady, but Indicates More Dovish 2024
description: The U.S central bank Wednesday left its benchmark fed funds at a range of 5.25%-5.50%.

title: SCENE's Person of the Year: Ghostwriter
description: Shadowy producer Ghostwriter's AI-augmented song "Heart on My Sleeve" upended the music industry, AI discourse, and American politics. How?

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
description:
Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

Coinbase introduces spot trading for users outside US. Meanwhile, the OKX decentralized exchange (DEX) suffered an exploit resulting in a loss of around $2.7 million in cryptocurrencies after a proxy admin upgraded a contract that allowed a hacker to compromise the private key. And BlackRock has revised the structure of its pending spot Bitcoin (BTC) exchange-traded fund (ETF).

Institutional clients on the Coinbase International Exchange based outside the U.S. will be able to trade Bitcoin and Ether against USD Coin starting on Dec. 14.

According to a post from the blockchain security company PeckShield, the total loss of the OKX DEX attack was around $2.7 million in various cryptocurrencies. PeckShield advised users to “please revoke allowances” if there are any.

Read more

title: Argentina’s new president tackles monetary policy with 50% currency devaluation
description:
In a bold move to address Argentina’s deepening economic crisis, President Javier Milei‘s administration has implemented a sweeping 50% devaluation of the national currency, the Argentine peso. This radical measure, announced on Dec. 12, marks a significant shift in the nation’s approach to combating its longstanding financial troubles. 50% devaluation As part of a broader […]

The post Argentina’s new president tackles monetary policy with 50% currency devaluation appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: S&P Global Ratings Introduces Stablecoin Stability Assessment Rankings
description: In a combination of both traditional and decentralized finance (defi) sectors, S&P Global Ratings has announced the launch of its stablecoin stability assessment. The latest tool aims to evaluate the ability of stablecoins to maintain their value relative to fiat currencies. New S&P Ratings System Grades Stablecoins S&P Global Ratings’ new assessment system grades stablecoins […]

title: Cybercriminals exploit OAuth system to hijack user accounts and fuel cybercrime
description: In a recent warning, Microsoft’s security team has shed light on a concerning trend in the world of cybercrime. Criminals are increasingly exploiting the OAuth system, commonly used by websites to verify user identities, gain unauthorized access to systems, and launch various forms of cyberattacks, including illicit cryptocurrency mining.  The exploitation of OAuth applications by […]

title: Bitwise forecasts Bitcoin at $80,000 in 2024
description: Per Bitwise Asset Management, 2024 predictions include Bitcoin reaching unprecedented heights with a new all-time high.
